pullRequest.title: [NETBEANS-4339] PHP Mess Detector - added option to use custom rules
pullRequest.bodyText:
Add option to select custom rule set file in PHP Mess Detector configuration.
Customizer panel is also updated.
https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/NETBEANS-4339
Before:

After:

beforeCommit.message: [NETBEANS-4339] PHP Mess Detector - added option to use custom rule set file

afterCommit.message: [NETBEANS-4339] PHP Mess Detector - added option to use custom rule set file

nodes.bodyText: You could/should set not to use FQN (it should be somewhere in the IDE Options, Java GUI editor). Then, the patch would be a bit more readable. Thanks.

nodes.bodyText: Should use package private instead of public.
I would consider i18n because it is not a command or parameter.
